languages.text: "Зачем?" {n}Ахиллеас едва слышно усмехается.{/n} "Такова природа врагов Человечества, Ваша Светлость. Им по вкусу... наша боль".

traits.locale_text: "Зачем?" {n}Ахиллеас едва слышно усмехается.{/n} "Такова природа врагов Человечества, Ваша Светлость. Им по вкусу... наша боль".

languages.text: "Why?" {n}Achilleas lets out a slight chuckle.{/n} "Such is the nature of the enemies of Humanity, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They have a taste... for our pain."
languages.original_text: "Зачем?" {n}Ахиллеас едва слышно усмехается.{/n} "Такова природа врагов Человечества, Ваша Светлость. Им по вкусу... наша боль".

traits.locale_text: "Why?" {n}Achilleas lets out a slight chuckle.{/n} "Such is the nature of the enemies of Humanity, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They have a taste... for our pain."
"Why?" {n}Achilleas lets out a slight chuckle.{/n} "Such is the nature of the enemies of Humanity, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They have a taste... for our pain."
"Why?" {n}Achilleas lets out a slight chuckle.{/n} "Such is the nature of the enemies of Humanity, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They have a taste... for our pain."
"Why?" {n}Achilleas lets out a slight chuckle.{/n} "Such is the nature of the enemies of Humanity, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They have a taste... for our pain."
"Why?" {n}Achilleas lets out a slight chuckle.{/n} "Such is the nature of the enemies of Humanity, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They have a taste... for our pain."

languages.text: 「なぜ？」{n}アキレアスは思わず笑みをこぼした。{/n}「それが人類の敵の本質です、陛下。奴らは…我々が苦しむ姿を見ることに愉悦を感じるのです」
languages.original_text: "Why?" {n}Achilleas lets out a slight chuckle.{/n} "Such is the nature of the enemies of Humanity, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They have a taste... for our pain."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ？」{n}アキレアスは思わず笑みをこぼした。{/n}「それが人類の敵の本質です、陛下。奴らは…我々が苦しむ姿を見ることに愉悦を感じるのです」

languages.text: “为什么？”{n}阿吉里亚斯低声笑了起来。{/n}“因为这就是人类之敌的本性啊，大人。他们以……折磨我们为乐。”
languages.original_text: "Why?" {n}Achilleas lets out a slight chuckle.{/n} "Such is the nature of the enemies of Humanity, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They have a taste... for our pain."

traits.locale_text: “为什么？”{n}阿吉里亚斯低声笑了起来。{/n}“因为这就是人类之敌的本性啊，大人。他们以……折磨我们为乐。”

languages.text: «¿Por qué?». {n}Achilleas suelta una risita.{/n} «Es la naturaleza de los enemigos de la Humanidad, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Disfrutan... con nuestro dolor».
languages.original_text: "Why?" {n}Achilleas lets out a slight chuckle.{/n} "Such is the nature of the enemies of Humanity, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They have a taste... for our pain."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué?». {n}Achilleas suelta una risita.{/n} «Es la naturaleza de los enemigos de la Humanidad, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Disfrutan... con nuestro dolor».

languages.text: « Pourquoi ? {n}répète Achilleas en poussant un petit rire.{/n} C'est dans la nature des ennemis de l'humanité, Votre Seigneurie. Ils semblent se délecter de... notre douleur. »
languages.original_text: "Why?" {n}Achilleas lets out a slight chuckle.{/n} "Such is the nature of the enemies of Humanity, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They have a taste... for our pain."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi ? {n}répète Achilleas en poussant un petit rire.{/n} C'est dans la nature des ennemis de l'humanité, Votre Seigneurie. Ils semblent se délecter de... notre douleur. »

languages.text: "Warum?" {n}Achilleas kichert verbittert.{/n} "Weil dergestalt nun einmal die Natur der Feinde der Menschheit ist, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Sie finden Gefallen ... an unserem Schmerz."
languages.original_text: "Why?" {n}Achilleas lets out a slight chuckle.{/n} "Such is the nature of the enemies of Humanity, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They have a taste... for our pain."

traits.locale_text: "Warum?" {n}Achilleas kichert verbittert.{/n} "Weil dergestalt nun einmal die Natur der Feinde der Menschheit ist, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Sie finden Gefallen ... an unserem Schmerz."

languages.text: "Neden mi?" {n}Achilleas güler gibi oluyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, İnsanlığın düşmanlarının doğası böyledir. Acımızdan... Zevk alırlar."
languages.original_text: "Why?" {n}Achilleas lets out a slight chuckle.{/n} "Such is the nature of the enemies of Humanity, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They have a taste... for our pain."

traits.locale_text: "Neden mi?" {n}Achilleas güler gibi oluyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, İnsanlığın düşmanlarının doğası böyledir. Acımızdan... Zevk alırlar."
